sec.p: In the first wave of data collection (fielded 27 February to 10 March 2015), a nationally representative probability sample of respondents was recruited through Growth from Knowledgeâ€™s Knowledge Panel ( n = 1,263). Respondents were contacted again approximately 7 mo later (completion rate = 72%; n = 905). To avoid potential biases resulting from missing data, missing values were estimated using full information maximum likelihood ( 12).
